bib.title: plwordnet 3.0--almost there
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej and Szpakowicz, Stan and Maziarz, Marek and Rudnicka, Ewa
bib.abstract: It took us nearly ten years to get from no wordnet for Polish to the largest wordnet ever built. We started small but quickly learned to dream big. Now we are about to release plWordNet 3.0-emo–complete with sentiment and emotions annotated–and a domestic version of
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of the 8th Global WordNet Conference (GWC)
